title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 456.1 - Requirements for obtaining a snowmobile safety certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 456.1 - Requirements for obtaining a snowmobile safety certificate

State Regulations

Requirements for obtaining a snowmobile safety
certificate include: (a) attendance at
three of the four prescribed lessons; (b) completion of the workbook; and
(c) attainment of a score of 75 percent on
the final examination. Notes

456.1
